import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "./App.css"; import Card from "../Card/Card" function App() { //variable declaration of card's active state const [isCardActive, setCardActiveState] = useState(false); const [activeCard, setActiveCard] = useState(null); //function that toggles card active state const toggleCardActive = () => { setCardActiveState(true); setActiveCard(); console.log(isCardActive); } return (
toggleCardActive(1)} />
toggleCardActive(2)} />
toggleCardActive(3)} />
toggleCardActive(4)} />
toggleCardActive(5)} />
toggleCardActive(6)} />
); } export default App;
